    • splitCSVLine

      public static String[] splitCSVLine(String line)
      method for split each line of book record into 6 different fields ( title, authors, price, isbn, genre and year) as a string array
      Parameters:
      line - each line of book records
      Returns:
      String save 6 fields into String array

    • checkSyntaxError

      public static void checkSyntaxError(String[] fields) throws TooManyFieldsException, TooFewFieldsException, MissingFieldException, UnknownGenreException
      check syntax error by inserting String[] fields
      Parameters:
      fields - an array of string saving all fields of a book
      Throws:
      TooManyFieldsException - fields more than 6
      TooFewFieldsException - fields less than 6
      MissingFieldException - missing price, year, author...or other fields
      UnknownGenreException - genre is not one of KNOWN_GENRES

    • overwriteMultiFiles

      public static void overwriteMultiFiles() throws IOException
      Initialize the BufferedWriter objects for 8 files for covering output from last time running
      Throws:
      IOException - error when reopening the file

    • do_part2

      public static void do_part2()
      validating semantics,read the genre files each into arrays of Book objects, then serialize the arrays of Book objects each into binary files.

    • getGenreFiles

      private static String[] getGenreFiles()
      hard-code the names of the output files from part 1 and create getter method to get these private attributes
      Returns:
      String save all files' name in String array

    • overwriteFile

      public static void overwriteFile(String fileName) throws IOException
      for overwrite and clear output from last time running, as an empty file
      Throws:
      IOException - may occur when can not write into the file

    • checkSemanticError

      public static void checkSemanticError(String[] fields) throws BadPriceException, BadIsbn10Exception, BadIsbn13Exception, BadYearException, BadIsbnException
      check semantic errors will throw more than BadPriceException, BadIsbn10Exception, BadIsbn13Exception, BadYearException, because the digits of isbn may not 10 or 13 digits, then throw BadIsbnException
      Parameters:
      fields - each book record with 6 fields
      Throws:
      BadPriceException - negative price
      BadIsbn10Exception - invalid ISBN-10
      BadIsbn13Exception - invalid ISBN-13
      BadYearException - year before 1995 or after 2010
      BadIsbnException - invalid ISBN length

    • correctISBN

      public static String correctISBN(String isbn)
      as some Isbn has written in the format of Scientific notation, which need to be considered,too
      Parameters:
      isbn - isbn from each book
      Returns:
      String still a string but without letter

    • validateIsbn

      public static void validateIsbn(String isbn) throws BadIsbn10Exception, BadIsbn13Exception, BadIsbnException
      method to validate ISBN is 10 or 13, others throws BadIsbnException
      Parameters:
      isbn - isbn
      Throws:
      BadIsbn10Exception - invalid ISBN-10
      BadIsbn13Exception - invalid ISBN-13
      BadIsbnException - invalid ISBN length

    • validateISBN10

      public static void validateISBN10(String ISBN) throws BadIsbn10Exception
      method to validate ISBN with 10
      Parameters:
      ISBN - isbn
      Throws:
      BadIsbn10Exception - sum is not a multiple of 10.

    • validateISBN13

      public static void validateISBN13(String ISBN) throws BadIsbn13Exception
      method to validate ISBN with 13 digits
      Parameters:
      ISBN - isbn
      Throws:
      BadIsbn13Exception - sum is not a multiple of 10.

    • convertIntoBooks

      public static Book convertIntoBooks(String[] fields)
      put all book records from string array in to a Book object array
      Parameters:
      fields - a String array with different fields in the specific index
      Returns:
      Book new book object and save all fields by Book constructor

      Parameters:

    • do_part3

      public static void do_part3()
      reading the binary files, deserialize the array objects in each file,and then provide an interactive program to allow the user to navigate the arrays.

      public static int countRecordsInFile(String fileName)
      count how many book records in each binary file, then using to define the Book array's length for each genre binary file
      Parameters:
      fileName - binary file
      Returns:
      int count book records in each file

      Returns:

      read the object in each binary file into an array of Book objects
      Parameters:
      fileName - which binary file need to be read
      numOfBookRecords - how many books need to be read from this file
      Returns:
      Book read book objects then save in a book array
